product_desc: Loadtap is an on demand platform that allows small trucking companies, who are underserved by current solutions, and their brokers to streamline and optimize their operations for freight booking, tracking and management. Brokers can book their loads on Loadtap either with carriers in their private network or open for public bidding. Carriers dispatch load details to their drivers’ mobile app, obtain truck tracking and load status in real-time which is shared with their brokers. Loadtap allows both carriers and brokers to manage their current and past loads and provides online documentation support. Loadtap helps eliminate inefficiencies and create new business opportunities for both carriers and brokers by expanding their network.
name: Loadtap
